verses.name: John 1:49
verses.text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him, Rabbi, thou art the Son of God; thou art the King of Israel.

verses.name: John 1:50
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.

verses.name: John 1:51
verses.text: And he saith unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Hereafter ye shall see heaven open, and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man.
